overview: A sergeant must deal with his desires to save the lives of young soldiers being sent to Vietnam. Continuously denied the chance to teach the soldiers about his experiences, he settles for trying to help the son of an old army buddy.
tagline: The story of the war at home, and the people who lived through it.
cast: James Caan|Anjelica Huston|James Earl Jones|D.B. Sweeney|Dean Stockwell
